Welcome to Austrocruise™, a space tourism company that can take you to the stars.
Our mission is to bring space travel to the public, making the beauty of our universe more accessible. We'll see you out there!

At Astrocruise, we are on a mission to make space travel accessible and exciting for everyone. As pioneers in the industry, we have been dedicated to this goal for years, and we are proud to have developed a reputation for delivering safe and unforgettable space tourism experiences.


Our team is made up of some of the most talented and passionate professionals in the field, including former astronauts,aerospace engineers, and space enthusiasts. We are all united by our love of exploration and our commitment to making space travel a reality for as many people as possible.

We offer a wide range of space tourism packages to suit different budgets and interests, and we are always working on developing new and exciting offerings to give our guests the best possible experience. Whether you are an experienced space enthusiast or a first-time traveler, we have something for everyone.

So if you have always dreamed of experiencing the thrill of rocket launch, floating weightlessly in zero gravity, and witnessing the breathtaking beauty of the galaxy, then Astrocruise is the place for you. We can't wait to welcome you aboard and help you achieve your dream of space travel. Join us on this incredible journey and let us help you take your first steps towards becoming an astronaut.
